src:
Lautaro Martinez Berpaling ke Barcelona?
01 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah kabar buruk datang bagi Inter Milan. Striker mereka, Lautaro Martinez diberitakan mulai tertarik untuk pindah ke Barcelona.
Musim ini Martinez menjadi salah satu pemain andalan Nerrazurri. Ia dipercaya Antonio Conte menjadi penyerang utama Inter bersama dengan Romelu Lukaku.
Sang striker tampil apik dengan mengemas 5 gol dari 10 pertandingan bersama La Beneamata. Alhasil ia diberitakan mulai digoda Barcelona untuk pindah ke Catalunya.
Dilansir Mundo Deportivo, usaha Barcelona mulai membuahkan hasil. Sang striker diberitakan tertarik untuk pindah ke Barcelona.

Mengapa Lautaro tertarik pindah ke Barcelona? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Lautaro Martinez Turns to Barcelona?
Nov 01 2019, 21:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A bad news comes for Inter Milan. Their striker, Lautaro Martinez is reported to be interested in moving to Barcelona.
This season Martinez has become one of Nerrazurri's top players. He is trusted by Antonio Conte to be Inter's main striker along with Romelu Lukaku.
The striker performed beautifully by packing 5 goals in 10 matches with La Beneamata. As a result he reportedly began to be tempted by Barcelona to move to Catalunya.
Reported by Mundo Deportivo, Barcelona's efforts began to bear fruit. The striker is reportedly interested in moving to Barcelona.

Why is Lautaro interested in moving to Barcelona? Check out the information below.
